channel.title: Adding Experience when killing npcs
channel.description: ok, so say i want to simply add experience to slayer when i kill an NPC how would i do this??? it might sound nooby but i need your help! thanks if anyone can help :) PLEASE REPLY OR MESSAGE ME!

item.title: Adding Experience when killing npcs
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Hes using a different base than you… Did you notice that? Also hes in NPChandler not client…
And if you want a fucking solution try this…

If you want to use NPCHandler use

ppl.addSkillXp(ammount, skillid);

item.title: Adding Experience when killing npcs
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Ok, so open up Client.Java

This is the code:

[code] case 72: // Click to attack
if (attacknpc > 0) {
sendMessage(“You are already attacking an npc!”);
} else {
attacknpc = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
boolean Cant = false;

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].attacknpc > 0) {
                Cant = true;
                sendMessage("You can't attack a dueling npc!");
            }
            boolean slayer = true;

            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(60 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 1 to attack chickens.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 90) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 10) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(120 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 10 to attack skeletons.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1648) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 20) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(180 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 20 to attack crawling hands.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1832) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 30) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(210 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 30 to attack cave bugs.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1637) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 40) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(240 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 40 to attack jellys.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1604) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 55) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(270 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 55 to attack aberrant specters.");
                }
            }
            if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 2783) {
                if (playerLevel[18] >= 99) {
                    slayer = true;
                addSkillXP(350 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                } else {
                    slayer = false;
                    sendMessage(
                            "You need a slayer level of 99 to attack dark beasts.");
                }
            }
            if (attacknpc >= 0 && attacknpc < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs
                    && slayer == true
                    && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc] != null && !Cant) {

                if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer < 1
                        || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer
                                == playerId
                                || inwildy2 == true) {
                    IsAttackingNPC = true;
                    server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].StartKilling = playerId;
                    server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].RandomWalk = false;
                    server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = true;
                    if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX != absX
                            && server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY
                                    != absY) {
                        faceNPC(attacknpc);
                    }
                } else {
                    sendMessage("");
                }
            } else {
                ResetAttackNPC();
            } 
        }
        break;

[/code]

Search for Case 72 you will need to paste this under your “case” section of Client.Java
Also replace the NPCIDS to the NPC you want, as of now they are “chicken, skeleton, abbysal demon, dark beast, jelly, etc”

Hope this helped
-Sexy slay

Read full topic

and its the
str3ngthsc4pe source
heres a snippet from npchandler.java

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client)server.playerHandler.players[Player];

							ppl.teleportToX = 3207;
							ppl.teleportToY = 9378;
							ppl.addItem(6529, 1);
							ppl.sendMessage("Gratz, You killed a Green Dragon");
							ppl.sendMessage("When you get 50+ tokkul go through the portal at home for your reward!!");
